headline: $19+ Bn Military Power Solutions Market Opportunities and Strategies to 2034 | Energy Harvesters and Portable Solutions Set to Revolutionize the Industry
summary: The global military power solutions market is projected to grow from $9.29 billion in 2024 to $19.01 billion by 2034, driven by UAV adoption, renewable energy integration, and electrification of military vehicles. North America leads, while Asia-Pacific sees the fastest growth. Key players include Raytheon and Cummins.
